title: Lag and packet loss, never happened before. Unplayable.
body:
Hi,

i've always had 60 ping and a really smooth gameplay.

Since the last week, my ping is increased to 120 and the game is unplayable. 

i ran the Riot log tool and the difference between usual logs and recent logs are:

Ping 60>120

Packet loss 0,1 % > 4 %

Don't know what's happening, i didn't change anything in my pc and i'm not running any net service, task manager says no app is using net (and i've all closed anyway).

Any help? i can't play anymore :-\

replies.body: Packet loss can happen from connection problems or how your ISP is routing to the game server too.  Even if you didn't change anything yourself, your network can go through some wear and tear or changes.  Is uggest going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out possibilities of local issues and tune up your network.  Hopefully, it will fix the packet loss issue!

Update: now my ping is fixed to 40, that is even lower than ever before the problems started (had fixed 60). i never reached 40, lol, what's happening :-D

Maybe it was a network Isp temporany issue?

Anyway, thanks for your absolute quick reply. 

Good work
